titles: At a court held by the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor President, and the rest of the Governors of the Corporation for the Poor of London the 6th of February, 1655.
author: Governors for the Poor (London, England)
publisher: Printed by James Flesher, Printer to the honourable city of London,
notes: At end: Signed by the Appointment of the said Corporation; by William Haslope Clerk to the said Corporation.
